resources.string:
"MapNotes is an app that helps you jot down notes on the map.\n\n"
"To begin, long-click on the map to add your first location. " "You may then edit the notes of the locations on the map by clicking on the pins on the map."

"This page shows the notes that belongs to this location.

"
"You may add/edit notes in this page. You may also delete notes by swiping them.

"
"You may also delete this location from the map in this page."
